DOC.brief_summary: The use of octyl-2-cyanoacrylate adhesive glue is not inferior to traditional suturing for first degree perineal tears repair
DOC.brief_title: Biologic Glue for First Degree Perineal Tears
DOC.detailed_description: This is a prospective randomized trial, comparing the use of octyl-2-cyanoacrylate adhesive glue to traditional suturing, for the repair of first degree perineal tears.
DOC.criteria: women after instrumental or normal vaginal delivery with a diagnosis of first degree perineal tears excessive bleeding, chronic steroid treatment, immunosuppressive treatment, active infection, allergy to Dermabond or Histoacryl
